The expert analyzed the statements made: where he claimed that Manmohan Singh traveled abroad more in 5 years as PM than Narendra Modi.
The expert examined a video posted on BJ: s YouTube channel where Amit Shah made the claim, verifying the exact words spoken by him.
The expert compared the official data av: s Office (PMO) regarding the total number of international visits, number of countries visited, and number of days spent abroad by both Manmohan Singh and Narendra Modi during their respective terms.
The expert concluded that the claim made: as the data showed that Manmohan Singh had 35 foreign trips in his first term, while Narendra Modi had visited abroad 49 times during his first term, indicating that Modi had traveled more than Singh.
